apps.name: Marvel DB
apps.description: Search for your favorite Marvel characters, heroes AND villains(!!!). Uses a Marvel API, to get character and comic data.

apps.name: NAPD Gaming
apps.description: A website for the NAPD Community's Mordhau servers. Site gathers from an API server data, and also displays server rules.

apps.name: Vue Todo
apps.description: CRUD(Create, read, update, delete) vue app, which maintains a todo list. Features a completed list.

apps.name: UPL Esports
apps.description: A website for finding E-Sports tournaments, and E-Sports related news. Uses a headless CMS to create content posts.

apps.name: Vue Scoreboard
apps.description: A scoreboard app made with Vue, and pure css(that means no bootstrap!). Features editing, and player add/delete.

apps.name: React Scoreboard
apps.description: A scoreboard app but this time it's made with React.

apps.name: WeatherVue
apps.description: A modern Vue app, using OpenWeather API to display a 5-day forcast for specified location.

apps.name: Palindrome
apps.description: A simple JavaScript app that determines if a word is a palindrome. Wrapped elegantly into a web app using Bootstrap.
